statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 2 \\ 24 \\ 8 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -17 \\ -7 \\ -36 \\ -10 \\ -23 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
